author: dlr
msg: On the merge-tracking branch: Tweak implementation of svnserve merge
which is already handled by svn_ra_svn_parse_tuple().

author: dlr
msg: On the merge-tracking branch: Adjust expectations for the merge info
retrieval API over ra_svn to be more allowing of change.
(get-merge-info): Change "rev" parameter to be inside an optional
(ra_svn_get_merge_info): Write revision inside an optional tuple.
(get_merge_info): Read revision from an optional tuple.

author: dlr
msg: On the merge-tracking branch: Formatting tweak.

author: dlr
msg: On the merge-tracking branch: Implement the merge info retrieval RA

author: dlr
msg: On the merge-tracking branch: Implement the merge info retrieval RA
API over ra_svn, and correct the corresponding section of the protocol
(get-merge-info): To the "params" definition, add ellipses to
indicate that the tuple containing "path" arguments represents a
list, and add a ? before "rev" to indicate that it's optional.
